obfuscation: ﻿ Europe 's growing trend 70 police storm techno club - 700 pills seized.1 Ecstasy culture approaches its 10th summer.2 `` Mad for it , '' headlines minor and large over Europe 's major cities all writing about ecstasy , Europe 's latest drug problem .
original: ﻿ Europe's growing trend  70 police storm techno club - 700 pills seized.1 Ecstasy culture approaches its 10th summer.2 "Mad for it," headlines small and large over Europe's major cities all writing about ecstasy, Europe's latest drug problem.

obfuscation: The fact is that the UN has marked this drug as a Global Trend , it 's not merely in Europe it 's worldwide .
original: The fact is that the UN has marked this drug as a Global Trend, it's not just in Europe it's worldwide.

obfuscation: Where did it come from and how did it become here ?
original: Where did it come from and how did it get here?

obfuscation: It started in Californian as a treatment for Psychoanalysis , it allowed the patient to open up and share their intermost feelings and talk about their childhood easier .
original: It started in Californian as a treatment for Psychoanalysis, it allowed the patient to open up and share their intermost feelings and talk about their childhood easier.

obfuscation: It then reached into underground sub-culture and soon after became illegal .
original: It then reached into underground sub-culture and soon after became illegal.

obfuscation: The sub-culture popularly referred to as Rave , can be compared to sub-cultures of the sixties and seventies , such as flower children and hippies .
original: The sub-culture popularly referred to as Rave, can be compared to sub-cultures of the sixties and seventies, such as flower children and hippies.

obfuscation: Rave is basically a dance party with loud techno and house type music .
original: Rave is basically a dance party with loud techno and house type music.

obfuscation: Odd lighting effects people dancing everywhere , and the use of synthetic drugs , mainly ecstasy are much present .
original: Odd lighting effects people dancing everywhere, and the use of synthetic drugs, mainly ecstasy are often present.

obfuscation: Ecstasy started being used by ravers about from the start of the rave , which began in the early eighties .
original: Ecstasy started being used by ravers almost from the start of the rave, which began in the early eighties.

obfuscation: It spread from the Chicago nightlife and New York black-gay fit to Europe under a very short period .
original: It spread from the Chicago nightlife and New York black-gay scene to Europe under a very short period.

obfuscation: There are many reasons why ecstasy has attracted such a large audience with its , social acceptance , accessibility and inexpensive production cost it has become the second about used drug in the European Union .
original: There are many reasons why ecstasy has attracted such a large audience with its, social acceptance, accessibility and inexpensive production cost it has become the second most used drug in the European Union.

obfuscation: Over 30 million users worldwide ( 4 % of the world population ) , according to the UNWDP ( e.g .
original: Over 30 million users worldwide (4% of the world population), according to the UNWDP (e.g.

obfuscation: United Nations General Assembly on the World Drug Problem ) .
original: United Nations General Assembly on the World Drug Problem).

obfuscation: Lets look at a few of the causes for the increase of ecstasy .
original: Lets look at a few of the causes for the increase of ecstasy.

obfuscation: One cause is the social acceptance of the drug .
original: One cause is the social acceptance of the drug.

obfuscation: Its side effects are not entirely known .
original: Its side effects are not entirely known.

obfuscation: People have regarded ecstasy as a relatively safe drug , but this is not the entire truth .
original: People have regarded ecstasy as a relatively safe drug, but this is not the entire truth.

obfuscation: There have been a number of deaths many occurring at clubs or raves where dehydration and over heating have been a major factor .
original: There have been a number of deaths many occurring at clubs or raves where dehydration and over heating have been a major factor.

obfuscation: The reason for this is that when on ecstasy one is given an euphoric feeling , which inhibits the body 's signals , which in a normal situation would warn the person that they are thirsty and tired .
original: The reason for this is that when on ecstasy one is given an euphoric feeling, which inhibits the body's signals, which in a normal situation would warn the person that they are thirsty and tired.

obfuscation: In the case of the raver who is on ecstasy he/she keeps on dancing disregarding any warning signs .
original: In the case of the raver who is on ecstasy he/she keeps on dancing disregarding any warning signs.

obfuscation: Drug abuse is much used by youths trying to cope with the problems of unemployment , neglect , violence and sexual abuse .
original: Drug abuse is often used by youths trying to cope with the problems of unemployment, neglect, violence and sexual abuse.

obfuscation: This is not the case with ecstasy ; it became popular by youths that were socially integrated , youths , whose parents would appear to be more tolerant towards the use of drugs .
original: This is not the case with ecstasy; it became popular by youths that were socially integrated, youths, whose parents would appear to be more tolerant towards the use of drugs.

obfuscation: For many , ecstasy is perfect , it lasts a few hours , it can not be traced once worn off and the price is correct .
original: For many, ecstasy is perfect, it lasts a few hours, it cannot be traced once worn off and the price is right.

obfuscation: Ecstasy and early synthetic drugs can be easily synthesized in makeshift labs , called kitchens and sold at relatively cheap prices .
original: Ecstasy and other synthetic drugs can be easily synthesized in makeshift labs, called kitchens and sold at relatively cheap prices.

obfuscation: The easy production of the drug has allowed the drug pushers a cheaper drug to distribute with relatively fiddling risk of being caught .
original: The easy production of the drug has allowed the drug pushers a cheaper drug to distribute with relatively little risk of being caught.

obfuscation: Production procedures are spread via Internet along with information on how to obtain the raw materials and equipment for synthesis of ecstasy .
original: Production procedures are spread via Internet along with information on how to obtain the raw materials and equipment for synthesis of ecstasy.

obfuscation: One means to stop the outflow of synthetic drugs is to try and ban the sale of the chemicals , which are needed to produce them .
original: One way to stop the outflow of synthetic drugs is to try and ban the sale of the chemicals, which are needed to produce them.

obfuscation: However , with the lucrative business the pushers use early chemicals and fillers are used , that in the end make for a drug that can be more dangerous because it may have ingredients that are poisonous to the system .
original: However, with the lucrative business the pushers use other chemicals and fillers are used, that in the end make for a drug that can be more dangerous because it may have ingredients that are poisonous to the system.

obfuscation: Resulting in `` impure '' dosages that can cause allergic reactions , psychosis , or end .
original: Resulting in "impure" dosages that can cause allergic reactions, psychosis, or death.

obfuscation: Since the laboratories used to make Ecstasy can be anything from makeshift kitchens to sophisticated labs , production is increasing , allowing for easy accessibility .
original: Since the laboratories used to make Ecstasy can be anything from makeshift kitchens to sophisticated labs, production is increasing, allowing for easy accessibility.

obfuscation: Accessibility has been one of the reasons for drugs spreading quickly , this holds true for ecstasy as well .
original: Accessibility has been one of the reasons for drugs spreading quickly, this holds true for ecstasy as well.

obfuscation: The chemicals used in ecstasy are inexpensive and globally accessible .
original: The chemicals used in ecstasy are inexpensive and globally accessible.

obfuscation: Synthetic drugs , such as ecstasy can be synthesized close to the customers consequently staying out of custom or border control .
original: Synthetic drugs, such as ecstasy can be synthesized close to the customers therefore staying out of custom or border control.

obfuscation: Moreover , today 's surveillance technology does not permit sensitive detection of these drugs .
original: Moreover, today's surveillance technology does not allow sensitive detection of these drugs.

obfuscation: For instance , dogs can not trace artificially synthesized drugs such as ecstasy .
original: For instance, dogs cannot trace artificially synthesized drugs such as ecstasy.

obfuscation: Because of its potency , a minor quantity is all that is needed to supply over a thousand trips , making it more difficult to trace by customs .
original: Because of its potency, a small quantity is all that is needed to supply over a thousand trips, making it more difficult to trace by customs.

obfuscation: The more accessible a drug is the more probable of it spreading to a larger fraction of the population .
original: The more accessible a drug is the more likely of it spreading to a larger fraction of the population.

obfuscation: As long as the accessibility , acceptability , and low purchase price of ecstasy stays potent , there will only be a rise in the demand , thus increasing deaths and unknown side effects for our youth .
original: As long as the accessibility, acceptability, and low purchase price of ecstasy stays strong, there will only be a rise in the demand, thus increasing deaths and unknown side effects for our youth.

obfuscation: This weekend drug will continue spreading on the dance floors unless something is made to make people aware of the dangers .
original: This weekend drug will continue spreading on the dance floors unless something is done to make people aware of the dangers.

obfuscation: Ignorance about the side effects of this drug should not make it more acceptable ; nevertheless this is the case .
original: Ignorance about the side effects of this drug should not make it more acceptable; nevertheless this is the case.

obfuscation: Ignorance has become bliss .
original: Ignorance has become bliss.

obfuscation: You get what you pay for and that is exactly the case , an unknown drug , cheaply produced with synthetic chemicals bought at a cheap price for the soul purpose of making profit .
original: You get what you pay for and that is exactly the case, an unknown drug, cheaply produced with synthetic chemicals bought at a cheap price for the soul purpose of making profit.
